text: Ara smarana karo! Amara isara'ilera bansadharadera theke cukti grahana karechilama -- “tomara allah chara ara karo upasana karabe na, ara matapitara prati bhalo byabahara karabe, ebam a‌tmiyasbajanadera prati, ara etimadera prati, ara misakinadera prati, ara lokadera sathe bhalobhabe katha balabe, ara namaya kayema karabe o yakata adaya karabe.” Tarapara tomara tomadera alpa kayekajana chara phire gele, ara tomara phire yabara dalera.
